p.d:
Monitoring extension for PHP, collects error events and statistics and send them to one of his drivers: SQLite and MariaDB/MySQL drivers are storing those in a database. StatsD driver sends them to StatsD using UDP. Socket driver sends them via UDP or TCP socket using its dedicated protocol. More drivers to come (SNMP, e-mail, Hadoop,...).
A web frontend exists for manipulating the data stored in database at: https://github.com/patrickallaert/php-apm-web
